text: Title: Honeyland (Medena zemja) Year: 2019 Genre: Documentary Language: Macedonian, Albanian, Serbo-Croatian Release date: January 28, 2019 (San Sebastian Film Festival), August 29, 2019 (North Macedonia) IMDb rating: 8.1/10 based on 3,048,819 user reviews Link: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt9331552/ Runtime: 87 minutes Directors: Tamara Kotevska, Ljubomir Stefanov Cast: Hatidze Muratova, Nazifé Muratova, Hussein Sam, Ljutvie Sam Producer: Atanas Georgiev Cinematography: Fejmi Daut Editor: Atanas Georgiev Plot summary: In the remote mountains of North Macedonia lies an untouched world where time seems to stand still. Among these hidden valleys is the home of Hatidze Muratova and her ailing mother. The two live off the land, their livelihood coming from the honey they produce in the forests around them. However, when a nomadic family moves into the area with seven children and a multitude of farm animals, their peaceful existence is disrupted. Not only do they have to deal with the noise and chaos brought about by the large family, but also with the greedy neighbors who ransack their beehives for every last drop of honey. Over three long years, we observe this secretive way of life as it struggles to maintain its balance between nature and mankind, illuminated by the gentle light of dawn and the soft glow of lanterns at dusk. Winner of the World Documentary Award at the San Sebastian International Film Festival. Awards: * Academy Awards: Nominee, Best International Feature Film (Tamara Kotevska, Ljubomir Stefanov) * Academy Awards: Nominee, Best Documentary Feature (Tamara Kotevska, Ljubomir Stefanov) * European Film Awards: Nominee, European Documentary (Tamara Kotevska, Ljubomir Stefanov) * Sundance Film Festival: Grand Jury Prize - World Cinema Documentary (Tamara Kotevska, Ljubomir Stefanov) * San Francisco International Film Festival: Golden Gate Award – Documentary (Tamara Kotevska, Ljubomir Stefanov) Download links: Magnet link for subbed versions: * 720p Blu-ray x264: magnet:?xt=urn:btih:ee2a8127c58281c49413691eda61e79bf1a36c05&dn=Honeyland.2019.BD720P.Turkish.BTDX8 * 1080p Blu-ray x264: magnet:?xt=urn:btih:1733ec45b5a1acfa2da7e33dc18b12b22dbc8274&dn=Honeyland.2019.BD1080P.Turkish.BTDX8 Magnet link for raw versions: * 720p Blu-ray: magnet:?xt=urn:btih:a24e8a2738762fadea79f564054a15ae2c3ff4f7&dn=Honeyland.2019.SUBBED.720p.BluRay.x264-GHOULS * 1080p Blu-ray: magnet:?xt=urn:btih:a11d950dba8aa4b84d346463fd4485f70b76d344&dn=Honeyland.2019.SUBBED.1080p.BluRay.x264-GHOULS Subtitles available: English, Turkish, Romanian, Arabic, Greek, Polish
